GeneDef.label: Physically Gifted
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are physically adept and have potential to learn special combat forms.

GeneDef.label: Boundless
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene excel at combat arts and are able to execute combat maneuvers 40% more frequently, however, their talent fosters an arrogant attitude that reduces their experience gain by 25% and causes other fighters to dislike them.

GeneDef.label: Giant's Blood
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are descendants of giants - endowed with with great strength and stamina, though slow to recover. Their max stamina is increased by 80%, but stamina regeneration is reduced by 40%. Any attack made while using a melee weapon, or unarmed, deals an additional 25% damage.
